section.title: Install the Management Server on the First Host
section.para: The first step in installation, whether you are installing the Management Server on one host or many, is to install the software on a single node.

note.para: If you are planning to install the Management Server on multiple nodes for high availability, do not proceed to the additional nodes yet. That step will come later.

section.para: The &PRODUCT; Management server can be installed using either RPM or DEB packages. These packages will depend on everything you need to run the Management server.

section.title: Install on CentOS/RHEL
section.para: We start by installing the required packages:

section.title: Downloading vhd-util
section.para: This procedure is required only for installations where XenServer is installed on the hypervisor hosts.
Before setting up the Management Server, download vhd-util from vhd-util.
If the Management Server is RHEL or CentOS, copy vhd-util to /usr/share/cloudstack-common/scripts/vm/hypervisor/xenserver.
If the Management Server is Ubuntu, copy vhd-util to /usr/share/cloudstack-common/scripts/vm/hypervisor/xenserver.
